Articles.Content:
I would like to suggest an option to move the NavBall and/or Altimeter/the other instruments. When i use a large navball for ease of use, i am having trouble seeing my bigger crafts. The NavBall, and to a lesser extend the other instruments, obscure my view. Especially when i zoom in a little to have a good look at something. Being able to move them to the right or left would help.

Kind Regards,
Hold down middle mouse and move it up and down and then zoom in on what you want to see.
I too would love this. I hate choosing between a navball I can read and a ship I can see.

You can use the Period/Delete key on the Numpad to show/hide the navball quickly, or use the small arrow on top of the navball to hide it away/bring it back.

You probably already know that, though.
Can we also have the altimeter next to the navball, so I don't have to keep flicking my eyes the entire height of the screen when I'm flying a plane?
